      • validateLogin

        public boolean validateLogin(java.lang.String loginName,
                    int pinNumber)
        Checks a user's login name and password against a database table.
        Parameters:
        loginName - - user's login name
        pinNumber - - user's pin number
        Returns:
        true if login name and password exist in the database and match, false if they don't exist or don't match
